planets.name: Mercury
planets.description: The smallest planet in our solar system and nearest to the sun!

planets.name: Venus
planets.description: Second planet from the sun, there is nothing interesting about this one.

planets.name: Earth
planets.description: Third in line, contains lifeforms bent on destroying the planet.

planets.name: Mars
planets.description: Fourth planet and also the god of war.

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.description: Fifth from the sun, and twice as large as all of the other planets combined!

planets.name: Saturn
planets.description: Sixth planet and surrounded by some sweet rings.

planets.name: Uranus
planets.description: There is absolutely nothing funny about this planets name.

planets.name: Pluto
planets.description: It is a planet because I say so DAMMIT.
